test.support.temp_cwd¶

test.support.temp_cwd(name='tempcwd', quiet=False)¶

Context manager that temporarily creates and changes the CWD.

The function temporarily changes the current working directory after creating a temporary directory in the current directory with name name. If name is None, the temporary directory is created using tempfile.mkdtemp.

If quiet is False (default) and it is not possible to create or change the CWD, an error is raised. If quiet is True, only a warning is raised and the original CWD is used.
